title: Jose Mourinho dashed off to Portugal twice in 24 hours to be at his wife Matilde’s side after emergency operation – The Sun

text:
Vatican City Home News Portugal Jose Mourinho dashed off to Portugal twice in 24 hours to be at his wife Matilde’s side after emergency operation – The Sun Jose Mourinho dashed off to Portugal twice in 24 hours to be at his wife Matilde’s side after emergency operation – The Sun January 1, 2017 The Sun Jose Mourinho dashed off to Portugal twice in 24 hours to be at his wife Matilde’s side after emergency operation The Sun The next day he left his base at the Lowry Hotel at 8am and flew back to Portugal , again in late morning. He was back the same evening. Each time Mourinho, 53, was chauffeur-driven to Hospital De Sao Jose, a 104-bed private clinic within the state-run …
